name: 陳偉堯
objective: 本課程作為大一學生入學後第一門程式語言奠基課程，將教授計算機概念及架構、數字系統與編碼系統、電腦指令、程式概念及 Fortran 高階程式語言，內容包括電腦歷史、語言發展、電腦運作概念、整數和實數的二進位表達方法、指定敘述、分支敘述、迴圈敘述、輸出輸入敘述、陣列處理、檔案處理、及子程式等課題。
schedule:
Week 01: Chapter 1 binary and decimal numbers
Week 02: Chapter 2 basic elements of Fortran (variables)
Week 03: Chapter 2 basic elements of Fortran (statements)
Week 04: Chapter 3 branching structures (if/then/else)
Week 05: 放假
Week 06: Chapter 3 branching structures (if/then/else)
Week 07: Chapter 3 branching structures (switch)
Week 08: ACRS 2023 國際研討會 (停課)
Week 09: Chapter 4 loops (do loop)
Week 10: Chapter 4 loops (while loop)
Week 11: Chapter 5 file input
Week 12: Chapter 5 file output (Exam #2)
Week 13: Chapter 6 arrays
Week 14: Chapter 6 arrays
Week 15: Chapter 7 procedures
Week 16: Chapter 7 procedures
Week 17: 放假
Week 18: Final exam (Exam #3)
scorePolicy:
Homework and attendance 55%
Exam #1 15% (programming test)
Exam #2 15% (programming test)
Exam #3 15% (programming test)
materials: Chapman, S. J. (2018). Fortran for Scientists and Engineers, Fourth edition, McGraw Hill, 1024 pages, ISBN: 978-1-260-08417-7
consultation: 請寫電子郵件向授課教師諮詢，或約時間於辦公室當面諮詢。
remarks: 本學期原則採實體授課方式；因應疫情警戒標準，本學期教學及授課方式請依照學校網頁所公布之訊息為準：https://oaa.ntut.edu.tw/p/404-1008-98622.php?Lang=zh-tw 如果學校公佈採取遠距教學，將改用 Google Meet 進行教學，屆時網址會公佈在北科 i 學園，未選課者可直接 email 老師詢問網址。若採取遠距教學，會斟酌調整計分方式。
